NAEB RAO 8 0 NETWORK
ill Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
TO: All Network members
FROM? Network manager
RES De L £ T 8 ON FROM 1st QUARTER, 1957 OFFERING
From WSU4 comes word that the series CHALKDUST has been
TERMINATED AND THAT NO FURTHER PROGRAMS UN THE $ER IES W9LL
BE AVAILABLE AFTER THE ORIGINAL THIRTEEN AS CURRENTLY
OFFERED «
Thus, please delete programs #1 of CHALKDUST as
OFFEREO IN THE 1ST QUARTER, 1957 OFFERING,
IF YOU HAVE ORDERED CHALKDUST AND WISH TO SUBSTITUTE
ANOTHER SERIES FOR IT, PLEASE LET US KNOW BEFORE DECEMBER 3*
ii/5/56mk
